org.apache.james.jspf.core
Interface DNSService

All Known Implementing Classes:
DNSServiceXBillImpl
public interface DNSService

Interface which should be used to access all necassary DNS-Records

Method Detail

getSpfRecord

java.lang.String getSpfRecord(java.lang.String hostname,
                              java.lang.String spfVersion)
                              throws PermErrorException,
                                     NoneException,
                                     TempErrorException
Get the SPF-Record for a server given it's version TODO: support SPF Records too. This will be done if dnsjava support it!

Parameters:
hostname - The hostname for which we want to retrieve the SPF-Record
spfVersion - The SPF-Version which should used.
Returns:
The SPF-Record if one is found.
Throws:
PermErrorException - if more then one SPF-Record was found.
NoneException - if no SPF-Record was found.
TempErrorException - if the lookup result was "TRY_AGAIN"

getARecords

java.util.List getARecords(java.lang.String strServer,
                           int mask)
                           throws NoneException,
                                  PermErrorException,
                                  TempErrorException
Get a list of IPAddr's for a server using the mask length

Parameters:
strServer - The hostname or ipAddress whe should get the A-Records for
mask - The netmask to use
Returns:
The ipAddresses
Throws:
NoneException - if no A records was found
PermErrorException - if an PermError should be returned
TempErrorException - if the lookup result was "TRY_AGAIN"

The ipAddresses
Throws:

getTxtCatType

java.lang.String getTxtCatType(java.lang.String strServer)
                               throws NoneException,
                                      PermErrorException,
                                      TempErrorException
Get TXT records as a string

Parameters:
strServer - The hostname for which we want to retrieve the TXT-Record
Returns:
String which reflect the TXT-Record
Throws:
NoneException - if no TXT-Record was found
PermErrorException - if the hostname is not resolvable
TempErrorException - if the lookup result was "TRY_AGAIN"

the PTR-Records
Throws:

getMXRecords

java.util.List getMXRecords(java.lang.String domainName,
                            int mask)
                            throws PermErrorException,
                                   NoneException,
                                   TempErrorException
Get a list of masked IPAddr MX-Records

Parameters:
domainName - The domainName or ipaddress we want to get the ips for
mask - The netmask
Returns:
IPAddresses of the MX-Records
Throws:
NoneException - if no MX-Record was found
PermErrorException - if an PermError should be returned
TempErrorException - if the lookup result was "TRY_AGAIN"

Try to get all domain names for the running host
